channel.title: Matrix-Multiplication on The ML Surgeon
channel.description: Recent content in Matrix-Multiplication on The ML Surgeon

item.title: A Machine Learning Surgeon’s Toolkit: Advanced Matrix Multiplication in CUDA
item.description: During the first year of my Master’s Degree in Computer Science, I had to complete a project for a Machine Learning course. It involved implementing a small feed-forward neural network framework from scratch, using only numerical libraries and coding elements such as loss functions, backpropagation, and the feed-forward step.
